name: places/ChIJ6eCwpwP2wokR1yRzXayc3mE
formattedAddress: 174 E 107th St, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 174 E 107th St, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text:
Is there a way to give a place negative stars??
It's like the worst place to have your shoes fixed.
I left my shoes to get new soles for a week,  when I went to pick them up they haven't even touched them!!!
I asked the person to give me my shoes and money back because I paid in advance and the person got very offended!!
After arguing I got my money back and walked out of there with my shoes without being fixed. DO NOT WAIST YOUR TIME AND MONEY. avoid this place at all!!!

originalText.text: I don’t know how this place even has 3 stars. Had a zipper issue to be fixed on a shoe of mine, guy who was there didn’t even bother to take a second look at it, and turned me away. Went farther downtown and found another place that was much more helpful. Avoid this place if you can, you’re better off spending your money elsewhere.

originalText.text: They charged $15 just to place lifts on my shoes....I can get more than that done and pay no more than $10. I told him I would not be returning!!

text.text: They charged $15 just to place lifts on my shoes....I can get more than that done and pay no more than $10. I told him I would not be returning!!

originalText.text: Don’t go. My shoes are not repaired correctly and now they look ugly.

text.text: Don’t go. My shoes are not repaired correctly and now they look ugly.

originalText.text: They charged me five dollars for rear taps that are regularly three dollars elsewhere. On the plus side, they were still open when others were closed.
